title: Bug 6091[Editor Mgmt] Opening editor can trigger autobuild with no progress
description: Bug 6091[Editor Mgmt] Opening editor can trigger autobuild with no progress This can trigger anautobuild as a side effect.
OB: By convention opening an editor does a refreshFromLocal. I had a workspace that was not built and andautobuild got triggered when opening the first editor. Since there is noprogress the workbench was not responsive during around 10 minutes.
